use_cases.name: Account Notification
use_cases.details: Notification sent to account holders about changes in accounts

use_cases.name: Customer Care
use_cases.details: Customer care interactions by the support and other customer-facing teams

use_cases.name: Delivery Notification
use_cases.details: Updates about the delivery of products and services

use_cases.name: Fraud Alert
use_cases.details: Notifications of suspicious behavior identified the business

use_cases.name: Higher Education
use_cases.details: Messages sent by colleges, universities, and other educational institutions

use_cases.name: Low Volume
use_cases.details: A combination of two to five standard usage cases - for low throughput requirements

use_cases.name: Marketing
use_cases.details: Communications related to time-bound events and sales

use_cases.name: Mixed
use_cases.details: A combination of two to five standard usage cases

use_cases.name: Polling Voting
use_cases.details: Surveys, polling, and voting campaigns used for non-political purposes

use_cases.name: Public Service Announcement
use_cases.details: Messages aimed at creating awareness about important topics

use_cases.name: Security Alert
use_cases.details: Notifications that alert users about a potential breach of systems
